name: Hospital Sim: Emergency Doctor
description:
The most well-known and renowned hospital in the entire city wants to have your medical services to save the most complicated emergency patients.
Now you have the opportunity to demonstrate what you are worth, and prove everything for which you have always fought: to become the best surgeon in the country, and most importantly, save as much lives as possible!
Join our medical staff and start this new adventure.

- Attend your emergency patients in the streets
- Drive the ambulance to the hospital
- Take care of patients and diagnose their problem
- Give them the most appropriate treatment
- Treat the carefully: MRI Scan, surgery, dental treatments, sew wounds, and much more...
- Improve your skills in different levels!


What are you waiting for? Now... It's your time! Take your medical supplies and help us save lives Mr. Doctor!
